page.title: 12INTERESTING PEOPLE (A)
page.content: Those inhabitants who may be included because the have led interesting lives are unlikely to have lived in the area for long.Little of interest happens in such backwaters.What makes them interesting to us youngsters is the fact that they have lived long enough to have memories of times that have gone forever. The oldest inhabitant is Mrs.Beale who was born in 1886.She lives with her sister 10 years younger in the house their father Ernest Collin (1858-1952)had while he was head miller.Like most girls who left school at 14 she went into service returning in 1915 when her mother died.After marriage to a local farmworker she came home to Westbury when her husband died.Alice Collin her sister worked as a dressmaker in Brackley from 8am to 7pm 5\ days a week.
